name: Paduroiul
description:
DESCRIPTION:

The forest and the creatures that live in it are under attack! The loggers are determined to cut down every tree. But there is one creature in the forest they didn't take into account…

Paduroiul who emerged from Romanian mythology to protect the forest.

With the help of wonderful and magical weapons. A spear that heals his wounds and a bow whose arrows bind with plants those who wish to harm the forest. He intends to protect the forest at all costs because when it comes to harming the forest, Paduroiul is cruel and merciless.
